body:
> Ancient Greek and Persians were not all faggots. jews are the history keepers. They made it up, to make dumb people these days believe that faggotry has always existed.

What? It's attested all through their literature and in the bible. It's kind of pointless to try and deny that they did these things, they were commonplace back then.

> Lots of white people are satanic jew slaves. Can't deny that.

How are IFBs Jewish? Most of them hate Jews. And the New IFB denies the holocaust.

> We are. We are the nicest, most loving and caring race. By far.

How so? I've not seen any difference. I think you just want that to be true.

And yes, we kept slaves. The Romans had slaves, the American southerners had slaves, and you can bet your bottom dollar the most ancient white societies kept slaves. Everyone had slaves back then.
body_html:
Ancient Greek and Persians were not all faggots. jews are the history keepers. They made it up, to make dumb people these days believe that faggotry has always existed.

What? It's attested all through their literature and in the bible. It's kind of pointless to try and deny that they did these things, they were commonplace back then.

Lots of white people are satanic jew slaves. Can't deny that.

How are IFBs Jewish? Most of them hate Jews. And the New IFB denies the holocaust.

We are. We are the nicest, most loving and caring race. By far.

How so? I've not seen any difference. I think you just want that to be true.

And yes, we kept slaves. The Romans had slaves, the American southerners had slaves, and you can bet your bottom dollar the most ancient white societies kept slaves. Everyone had slaves back then.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

body:
> You are aware that women on college campuses are being carefully taught to see every man as a rapist, right?

I do too, even though I know I shouldn't. It's a built-in instinct. And this isn't new, why do you think society has always been so protective of girls around boys? Parents don't like their daughters going out with boys, everywhere has rules limiting boys' contact with girls (even more so in the olden days than now), etc. People have never trusted males because the females are more valuable and it's in our instincts to protect them as much as possible. This is the one disadvantage women have in society, overprotection. Other than that the majority of them are pampered as hell and can get whatever they want by crying about it.

> You are aware that every romantic interaction between men and women on college campuses is being portrayed as rape unless the woman is continuously expressing consent the entire time, right?

It's always been this way. Boys' contact with girls is probably more lax and permitted than it's ever been.
body_html:
You are aware that women on college campuses are being carefully taught to see every man as a rapist, right?

I do too, even though I know I shouldn't. It's a built-in instinct. And this isn't new, why do you think society has always been so protective of girls around boys? Parents don't like their daughters going out with boys, everywhere has rules limiting boys' contact with girls (even more so in the olden days than now), etc. People have never trusted males because the females are more valuable and it's in our instincts to protect them as much as possible. This is the one disadvantage women have in society, overprotection. Other than that the majority of them are pampered as hell and can get whatever they want by crying about it.

You are aware that every romantic interaction between men and women on college campuses is being portrayed as rape unless the woman is continuously expressing consent the entire time, right?

It's always been this way. Boys' contact with girls is probably more lax and permitted than it's ever been.

parent.body:
You are aware that women on college campuses are being carefully taught to see every man as a rapist, right?

You are aware of the nonsense fake statistic that the enemy is peddling which claims that 1 in 5 female college students get rape, right?

You are aware that every romantic interaction between men and women on college campuses is being portrayed as rape unless the woman is continuously expressing consent the entire time, right?

This was not the case 30 years ago, and I doubt it was the case even 10 years ago.

The enemy wants to destroy families, and they are working to do this by attempting to destroy romantic relationships between men and women.

post.body:
Remember back when leftists promoted sexual promiscuity around the clock and worked double extra hard to convince everyone that traditional sexual morality was somehow wrong?

They didn't do this because they wanted "free love." They did this because they had to destroy the existing positive paradigm before they could replace it with a horribly negative one.

Well they've moved on from "If it feels good...do it" to Orwell's Junior Anti-Sex League. The only kind of "sex" they promote is buggery and carpet munching, with pederasty waiting in the wings.

Human beings who have normal sexual interests which are correctly regulated will marry and start families. These families create children who grow up to be functional adults.

Functional adults is the last thing that leftists want to see. They want broken and damaged people to help them create hell on earth.

Remember when AntifaBLM proclaimed the destruction of families as one of their goals?

Not a coincidence.
post.body_html:
Remember back when leftists promoted sexual promiscuity around the clock and worked double extra hard to convince everyone that traditional sexual morality was somehow wrong?

They didn't do this because they wanted "free love." They did this because they had to destroy the existing positive paradigm before they could replace it with a horribly negative one.

Well they've moved on from "If it feels good...do it" to Orwell's Junior Anti-Sex League. The only kind of "sex" they promote is buggery and carpet munching, with pederasty waiting in the wings.

Human beings who have normal sexual interests which are correctly regulated will marry and start families. These families create children who grow up to be functional adults.

Functional adults is the last thing that leftists want to see. They want broken and damaged people to help them create hell on earth.

Remember when AntifaBLM proclaimed the destruction of families as one of their goals?

Not a coincidence.

body:
> The Democratic Party ate all the neocons

Then where are they? Because I don't know of any Democrat neocons.

> From a broader view, neoliberalism has successfully consumed the West but somehow (shock) the people are still unhappy. There is an inevitable reaction brewing.

Neoliberalism doesn't go far enough in my opinion. I still consider it somewhat authoritarian.
body_html:
The Democratic Party ate all the neocons

Then where are they? Because I don't know of any Democrat neocons.

From a broader view, neoliberalism has successfully consumed the West but somehow (shock) the people are still unhappy. There is an inevitable reaction brewing.

Neoliberalism doesn't go far enough in my opinion. I still consider it somewhat authoritarian.

parent.body:
> Then where are they? Because I don't know of any Democrat neocons.

Are you kidding? All the old neocons have been shilling for Biden and the neoliberal establishment since last year. Bill Kristol and Max Boot are the worst of the bunch. (Here's Max Boot saying "Not electing Hillary Clinton was one of the worst blunders in U.S. history." https://nitter.snopyta.org/MaxBoot/status/1369413053666779141)

https://www.theamericanconservative.com/state-of-the-union/the-neocons-exit-stage-left/

https://pjmedia.com/columns/mark-ellis/2020/09/18/never-trump-war-pigs-n941531

https://reason.com/2020/08/19/gop-hawks-are-turning-out-for-biden/

https://publicseminar.org/essays/the-rotten-alliance-of-liberals-and-neocons-will-likely-shape-u-s-foreign-policy-for-years-to-come-biden-kagan/

> Neoliberalism doesn't go far enough in my opinion. I still consider it somewhat authoritarian.

Of course it's authoritarian. Neoliberalism in practice takes only the parts of libertarianism that benefits the elite, and marries it with only the parts of socialism that benefit the elite. It is an attempt to destroy the nation-state and force people into a globalist regime managed by a handful of well-connected plutocrats.
parent.body_html:
Then where are they? Because I don't know of any Democrat neocons.

Are you kidding? All the old neocons have been shilling for Biden and the neoliberal establishment since last year. Bill Kristol and Max Boot are the worst of the bunch. (Here's Max Boot saying "Not electing Hillary Clinton was one of the worst blunders in U.S. history." https://nitter.snopyta.org/MaxBoot/status/1369413053666779141)

https://www.theamericanconservative.com/state-of-the-union/the-neocons-exit-stage-left/

https://pjmedia.com/columns/mark-ellis/2020/09/18/never-trump-war-pigs-n941531

https://reason.com/2020/08/19/gop-hawks-are-turning-out-for-biden/

https://publicseminar.org/essays/the-rotten-alliance-of-liberals-and-neocons-will-likely-shape-u-s-foreign-policy-for-years-to-come-biden-kagan/

Neoliberalism doesn't go far enough in my opinion. I still consider it somewhat authoritarian.

Of course it's authoritarian. Neoliberalism in practice takes only the parts of libertarianism that benefits the elite, and marries it with only the parts of socialism that benefit the elite. It is an attempt to destroy the nation-state and force people into a globalist regime managed by a handful of well-connected plutocrats.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: This is also why so many women act selfish and manipulative and cry over everything. Because from day one, they're pampered and told they're super special just for existing. They can get anything they want, and they deserve it, and if they don't they can just cry about it and everyone will rush to do their bidding. They are taught that they are entitled to not face the hard realities of life. Their parents, teachers, bosses, etc. coddle them immensely just because they're girls. They are rarely expected to endure stress or worry unless they decide to raise children. If they act lazy, selfish, manipulative, and do nothing with their lives but leech off of mens' labor society doesn't bat an eye, and even encourages this. Parents harshly punish their sons unfairly but let their daughters deliberately do whatever they want and *protect* them from the consequences. They can get away with horrific crimes without even an arrest, often accusing a male victim successfully; and even if they are sentenced it is 1/6th the amount a man would get for the exact same thing. And if the women aren't happy it's the end of the world, men who the fuck cares. Even in societies that oppressed them, much of this still held true. This is not only completely unfair to men, but makes the women grow into adults still being less mature than an 8-year-old boy; not because that's how they're made as some often assert, as actually females are *more* mature by nature; but because they're allowed to act that way. If you teach someone the whole world revolves around them, and that everyone else doesn't matter as long as you get your way, of course they're going to lack self-control.

parent.body:
I actually agree. I was a violent kid growing up (it was in my genes).

My dad sat me down right before I was 18, had a talk with me. He told me I can't punch people in the face any time situations get heated when I turn 18 because my ass will go to jail. He explained it much better than that but that is the summary. Then I realized, holy shit, I need to change what I'm doing or I'm going to jail.

So I stopped getting into fights. I haven't been in a fight since then. Years. Just because I had a parent who cared enough to tell me to stop being a hot-head. 

But it takes both to make a change like that - good parenting and a kid who is willing to make changes to their behavior. 

I feel that is what is missing from many of these folks: they never got the talk from their parents about self-control and/or the kid never thought to make changes to their behavior. When both are present, your kids group up to be well-adjusted adults.
parent.body_html:
I actually agree. I was a violent kid growing up (it was in my genes).

My dad sat me down right before I was 18, had a talk with me. He told me I can't punch people in the face any time situations get heated when I turn 18 because my ass will go to jail. He explained it much better than that but that is the summary. Then I realized, holy shit, I need to change what I'm doing or I'm going to jail.

So I stopped getting into fights. I haven't been in a fight since then. Years. Just because I had a parent who cared enough to tell me to stop being a hot-head.

But it takes both to make a change like that - good parenting and a kid who is willing to make changes to their behavior.

I feel that is what is missing from many of these folks: they never got the talk from their parents about self-control and/or the kid never thought to make changes to their behavior. When both are present, your kids group up to be well-adjusted adults.

body:
John 7:1: And after this Jesus was in Galilee, because he didn't want to be in *Judea* because the Jews were plotting to kill him.

Note that "the Jews" here absolutely does not mean "da joos" as you think of it. Jesus and his followers were jewish themselves, and plotting to kill themselves makes no sense. "The Jews" is the elite priesthood and the Pharisees and Sadducees who supported them and hated Jesus. And remember that white european gentiles were involved in this as well.

Luke 19:27

That's from a character in a parable, you took this completely out of context.

> Who Jesus rebukes 3 times, "Saul saul why do you persecute me?"

That was *before* he changed.

He is the closest thing in the whole bible to an anti-jew (though only because of later scribal edits to his works). Though you're probably right that he doesn't confess himself much, he does have a lot of outbursts and also often pride in himself. But he recognizes this and feels guilty about it.

body:
> Then she matured quickly. Became an adult. Now she's a decent person and can be tolerated.

Even still, society itself coddles women. It's involuntary unfortunately, because it's a primal reaction to 1) women have more of a baby face and look far more innocent, and 2) each female holds much greater value than a male, because one male can impregnate an endless amount of females, thus both sexes are designed around the female's needs and hardwired to care about females more. That's during normalcy, let alone the third wave feminism we're experiencing now.
body_html:

That's during normalcy, let alone the third wave feminism we're experiencing now.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

parent.body:
You just described my ex to perfection. Her parents gave her anything she wanted and she almost never got disciplined. Her brother was. Her brother is the one that was a well-adjusted adult, hard working, and successful even at 21 (when he was still working on his masters of accounting). 

Her parents raised her to be a narcissist even though she didn't want to be. She was just forced/pushed in that direction by bad parenting. She didn't pull her head out of her ass until I broke up with her and she had to survive on her own and work on her own in a job. Then she matured quickly. Became an adult. Now she's a decent person and can be tolerated.

Shitty parents, man. They are ruining kids especially girls. Tough love works. Tell your daughters "No." And if they throw a tantrum, don't give in. Put them in timeout. Bam. Huge portion of America's problems are solved by better raising daughters.
parent.body_html:
You just described my ex to perfection. Her parents gave her anything she wanted and she almost never got disciplined. Her brother was. Her brother is the one that was a well-adjusted adult, hard working, and successful even at 21 (when he was still working on his masters of accounting).

Her parents raised her to be a narcissist even though she didn't want to be. She was just forced/pushed in that direction by bad parenting. She didn't pull her head out of her ass until I broke up with her and she had to survive on her own and work on her own in a job. Then she matured quickly. Became an adult. Now she's a decent person and can be tolerated.

Shitty parents, man. They are ruining kids especially girls. Tough love works. Tell your daughters "No." And if they throw a tantrum, don't give in. Put them in timeout. Bam. Huge portion of America's problems are solved by better raising daughters.

body: I didn't quote the NIV, I translated the Greek version, which says Judea. "In Jewry" doesn't even make any sense, especially when it's compared to "in Galilee".
body_html: I didn't quote the NIV, I translated the Greek version, which says Judea. "In Jewry" doesn't even make any sense, especially when it's compared to "in Galilee".

body: Black people exist, accept it, not everyone has the same skin color as you do. If you don't want to interact with them that's fine, but if you want to live in a free country you're going to need to be able to deal with them existing within 1000 miles of you.
